situation.title: Kindergartens
situation.meta_description: Preschools stay open and children can attend in person.

situation.title: Primary schools
situation.meta_description: Personal attendance of children in schools is banned by governmental regulations until November 20th, 2020.

situation.title: Secondary schools
situation.meta_description: Based on governmental measures, in-person education in primary schools is banned until November 20th, 2020.

situation.title: After-school clubs (Družiny)
situation.meta_description: Personal attendance of children in after-school care is not allowed until November 20th, 2020.

situation.title: Language schools
situation.meta_description: Personal attendance of students in schools is not permitted until November 20th, 2020. This regulation also applies to language schools.

situation.title: Driving schools
situation.meta_description: Based on governmental measures, the operation of driving schools is are temporarily banned.

situation.title: Elementary art schools
situation.meta_description: Personal attendance of children in primary art schools is banned until  November 20th, 2020.

situation.title: High schools
situation.meta_description: Personal attendance in high schools is banned by governmental regulations until November 20th, 2020.

situation.title: Vocational schools
situation.meta_description: Personal attendance in vocational schools is banned by governmental regulations until November 20th, 2020.

situation.title: Higher Vocational Schools
situation.meta_description: Personal attendance in vocational colleges is banned by governmental regulations until November 20th, 2020.

situation.title: Maturita exam
situation.meta_description: Right now it is assumed that the final maturita exams will go forward as usual with the in-person presence of the students at the exam.

situation.title: Final exams
situation.meta_description: No form of final exams has been determined yet. Right now it is assumed that the exams will go forward as usual, with in-person attendance of students at the exam.

situation.title: Proms
situation.meta_description: School dances (e.g. maturitní plesy aka proms) are not allowed to happen in public or in private.

situation.title: Entrance exams
situation.meta_description: Right now it is assumed that the entrance exams will go forward as usual with the in-person presence of the students at the exam.

situation.title: Work experience
situation.meta_description: In-person attendance of students in practical education is not possible at the moment.

situation.title: Universities
situation.meta_description: In-person attendance of university students in schools is banned.

situation.title: After-school activities
situation.meta_description: In person attendance of children at after-school activities is not allowed.

situation.title: I´m a teacher
situation.meta_description: In-person attendance of students in schools is not allowed. Children are being taught through distance education.
